alert.note: Alert for Schuylkill (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 18 at 3:11AM EDT until October 19 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 expected. * WHERE...Schuylkill County. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 9 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Valley locations and sheltered areas will experience the coldest temperatures. This will likely bring and end to the growing season.
info.instruction: Take protective measures now as freezing temperatures could damage or kill tender plants and vegetation. Potted plants should be brought inside. The latest forecast information can be found on the NWS State College Facebook page and Twitter @NWSStateCollege, or on the web at weather.gov/ctp.
